message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to make a counteroffer of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
I see, Alice. Let me make a counteroffer of $110 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $112.50.
Alice, I appreciate your offers. Let me make a counteroffer of $110 for the product.
I'm starting to get a little frustrated, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $113.
Alice, I understand your position. Let me make a final counteroffer of $112 for the product.
Bob, I've been very patient, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $114, and that's my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts. My final counteroffer for the product is $113.
